response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which holds immense value to us and has been meticulously designed to meet your needs. This product, tailored to your specific requirements, is worth an estimated $1,000,000 to you. Considering its unique features and the benefits it offers, we are offering it to you at a special price of $950,000. We believe this offer provides a fantastic opportunity for both parties to benefit from this exceptional product. Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this offer.", "product_price": 950000}
